attributes.action: not use Prime Ministers Questions to make policy announcements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PMQ's sessions should not be used to promote or introduce government policy. Members of the governing party should not be allowed to ask preordained questions that allow the PM to announce a new policy or a review to a current policy. It should not be used as a party political broadcast. It is a session for members of all sides to ask genuine questions and not an advertising vehicle.
